name: codex-peer-review
description: Peer validation system using OpenAI Codex CLI. Validates Claude's designs and code reviews through structured discussion before presenting to user.

commands.name: codex-peer-review
commands.description: Trigger peer review validation with Codex CLI. Use without arguments for current changes, --base <branch> for specific branch comparison, or add a question for broad technical validation.

agents.name: codex-peer-reviewer
agents.description: Run peer review validation as a subagent. Dispatches Codex CLI validation in a separate context and returns synthesized results. Use this to keep the main conversation context clean.

skills.name: codex-peer-review
skills.description: Reference documentation for the peer review protocol. The actual validation should be dispatched to the codex-peer-reviewer agent to run in a separate context.
